title: The Guide to Super Likes on Tinder: Your Questions Answered

steps.title: A Super Like tells someone that you're very interested in them.
steps.content: A Super Like tells someone that you're very interested in them. When you Super Like someone on Tinder, a blue border appears around your name in their swipe deck, alongside the blue star icon representing the Super Like. [2] X Research source This makes your Tinder profile stand out to the user. Likewise, anyone who Super Likes you on Tinder will appear in your swipe deck with a blue border around their profile and a blue star icon next to their name.

steps.title: Purchase Super Likes à la carte.
steps.content: Purchase Super Likes à la carte. When you find someone that you want to Super Like, tap the blue star icon on their profile. If you already have Super Likes, you will send one at this time. Otherwise, you will be prompted to purchase a bundle of Super Likes. Pricing is subject to change, but offers range from: 3 Super Likes : $9.99 12 Super Likes : $30 50 Super Likes : $75 To buy Super Likes for later use, go to your Settings' and tap "Get Super Likes .

steps.title: Subscribe to Tinder Gold or Tinder Platinum.
steps.content: Subscribe to Tinder Gold or Tinder Platinum. Both premium subscriptions include 5 free Super Likes each week. These Super Likes do not roll over, so be sure to use them before the week resets! [3] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the blue star icon.
steps.content: Tap the blue star icon. When you see someone that you want to Super Like, tap the blue star icon on their profile. If you have Super Likes, you will send one immediately. Otherwise, you will be prompted to purchase a bundle of Super Likes.

steps.title: Look out for people who Super Like you.
steps.content: Look out for people who Super Like you. Getting Super Liked can be quite flattering, as it shows that this person is ready to match if you are! Swipe right on someone who Super Liked you to start chatting instantly. [4] X Research source This wikiHow article some great advice on how to message someone who Super Liked you!

steps.title: Subscribers can undo their Super Likes.
steps.content: Subscribers can undo their Super Likes. If you subscribe to Tinder Plus, Gold, or Platinum, you can use the built-in Rewind feature to reverse a Super Like. Non-subscribers cannot undo a Super Like, but Super Likes disappear in 24 hours anyway if neither user initiates a conversation.

steps.title: Evaluate the quality of your profile.
steps.content: Evaluate the quality of your profile. No matter how many Super Likes you send out, the key factor in securing matches is having a high-quality profile. Use your most attractive photos and include a couple witty jokes in your bio! This wikiHow article can help you build the ultimate Tinder profile.

steps.title: Consider the personality of the person you want to Super Like.
steps.content: Consider the personality of the person you want to Super Like. Does their profile offer any clues as to how they might receive a Super Like? Some users may find a Super Like flattering, while others could find it off-putting. Be careful not to scare a user away with a Super Like.

steps.title: Use Super Likes on people you recognize.
steps.content: Use Super Likes on people you recognize. If you happen to see someone that you recognize from your personal life, or that you have met in passing, a Super Like can be a great way to tell them you are interested in them. Because they may recognize you too, they are unlikely to find the Super Like creepy, and may reciprocate your expressed interest. [5] X Research source
